DOC.brief_title: Neurophysiological Assessment Healthy Impaired Human Lower Urinary Tract Function
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer : Written inform consent , good mental physical health , age > 18y , Patients LUTS Patients LUTS treatment : Written inform consent , age > 18y , prior urodynamic investigation , LUTS since > 6months without detrusor overactivity healthy volunteer : neurological urological pathology , current pregnancy lactation , urinary tract infection , hematuria , previous pelvic spine craniocerebral surgery , anatomical anomaly LUT genitalia , metabolic disease , LUT malignancy , bladder capacity < 150mL , SDV 60mL ; Patients LUTS Patients LUTS treatment : current pregnancy lactation , urinary tract infection , gross hematuria
